H0.text: Physical science is the branch of science that explains much of what you observe and do in your daily life.

H1.text: Temperature science is the branch of science that explains much of what you observe and do in your daily life.

H2.text: Psychology is the branch of science that explains much of what you observe and do in your daily life.

H3.text: Astronomy is the branch of science that explains much of what you observe and do in your daily life.

A4.text: Psychology is the scientific study of behavior and mind. Its subject matter includes the behavior of humans and nonhumans, both conscious and unconscious phenomena, and mental processes such as thoughts, feelings, and motives.

A5.text: Psychology is an academic discipline of immense scope, crossing the boundaries between the natural and social sciences.
